survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Smart Thermostat Features Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of smart thermostats to understand their satisfaction levels with various features and functionalities.

questions.question_text: How long have you been using a smart thermostat?
questions.client_notes: This question helps segment users by experience level. Ensure options are clear and cover common usage periods.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.
